reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you can’t swallow pills, here you go.
reviews.reviewText: I used to take a lot of health supplements in pill form. One day, I couldn’t swallow like I used to. Almost choked to death on huge, solid, dry pill. These gummy vitamins are nice.I’ve seen a few complaints about how disappointing these vitamins are…as a candy. They taste better than any dry pill ever.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good tasting Gummy vitamins
reviews.reviewText: The taste good, but frankly speaking cannot tell if they are effective.

reviews.reviewText: Has all the essential vitamins, great for people who just can’t swallow a pill but, very the very strong vitamin flavor makes me give them a 4 out of 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vitamin that tastes and absorbs the best, and is good until 2/2025
reviews.reviewText: Item arrived in time and this seller had vitamins that remain good for over a year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A reasonably priced gummy men's vitamin that actually has lycopene in it. Vegetarian friendly too.
reviews.reviewText: It seems like it is now surprisingly difficult to find a men's multivitamin with lycopene in it (and it is not as easy as it used to be to find lycopene alone). So I was happy to see that this multivitamin had at least a little lycopene (although not as much as most standalone lycopene supplements, if you can find them). Furthermore, it is vegetarian friendly -- it uses vegetable-based pectin, not animal-based gelatin to form the gels -- which may be important to some.These gummies are not as chewy as other gummies (like fiber gummies, for example). In other words, they're closer to a soft plastic than a rubber. But they have a good taste, and they chew very easily. I don't notice any digestive problems after taking two of them in the morning, even if I do not eat anything with them. For a vitamin with lycopene in them, I think the value is pretty decent too. So I will continue to buy these as my daily multivitamin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Peasy Gummy Chews from Natures Way. What could be better?
reviews.reviewText: I have used Natures Way products for years. My other vitamin regimen and supplement health needs are mostly Life Extension products. I use the Natures Way gummy chews as my daily multi vitamin because my concern is at my age I want a daily multi vitamin to be absorbed and utilized by my body as much as possible. So I refrain from hard compressed tablets that may not be fully absorbed by your body with portions of the vitamin passing through with your waste. I take Natures Way chews or the protein/vitamin drink M-F and no vitamins or supplements on the weekend. I do this so that any vitamins wont over accumulate in my body.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves these vitamins, but the last few shipments have arrived with all the gummies stuck together. The bottle has to be emptied bit by bit and the vitamins pried apart. We wonder how the quality is since its obvious they are heating up during transit.....
